とあって: (とあり) - due to the fact that; because of
とあらば: (とあらば) - if it is the case that; if
とあり: (とあり) - due to the fact that; because of
とある: (とある) - according to; reads; reading; is written; says; states
とあれば: (とあらば) - if it is the case that; if
といったらない: (といったらない) - (used after adj.) nothing more ... than this; as .... as it could possibly be
といっても過言ではない: (といってもかごんではない) - it is no exaggeration to say; it is not too much to say
とうの昔: (とうのむかし) - a long time ago

とう嚢炎: (とうのうえん) - navicular disease; navicular syndrome
とう鞳: (とうとう) - sound of bells or drums reverberating; sound of water or waves resounding
とか: (とか) - among other things; such things as; or something like that
とき: (とき) - regular (stops at every station) Jouetsu-line Shinkansen
ときの声: (ときのこえ) - war cry; battle cry
ときの気: (ときのけ) - infectious disease; plague; epidemic
ときめき: (tokimeki) - beating (do coração, com alegria, entusiasmo, etc.), palpitation, throbbing, pounding, fluttering
ときめく: (tokimeku) - to beat fast (do coração de alguém), to flutter (with joy, anticipation, etc.), to throb, to pound, to palpitate
とぎ汁: (とぎしる) - water that has been used to wash rice
とく: (どく) - (contraction of ..て or で plus 置く) to do something in readiness for; to get something (needful) done
とくだま: (とくだま) - Tokudama plantation lily; Hosta tokudama
とくの昔: (とくのむかし) - a long time ago
とぐろを巻く: (とぐろをまく) - to coil itself (e.g. a snake); to loaf around
とぐろを解く: (とぐろをほどく) - to uncoil itself
とけい座: (とけいざ) - {astron} Horologium (constellation); the Pendulum Clock
とけ込む: (とけこむ) - to melt into/to merge into; to fit in/to adapt/to blend
とことん: (tokoton) - o fim, terminar; até o fim, até o último, completamente, totalmente, por completo
とことんまで: (とことんまで) - to the bitter end; to the hilt
ところがどっこい: (ところがどっこい) - on the contrary
ところてん式に: (ところてんしきに) - systematically; in turn; consequentially; mechanically; automatically
ところを: (とこを) - although (it is a certain time or something is in a certain condition)
ところ変わって: (ところかわって) - meanwhile; in the meantime
ところ天: (ところてん) - gelidium jelly strips (made from agar-agar); (gay slang) prostate orgasm
とこを: (とこを) - although (it is a certain time or something is in a certain condition)
とさ: (とさ) - apparently; from what I have heard; they say; you know; I hear
とさかに来る: (とさかにくる) - to get mad
としたら: (としたら) - if it happens that; if we make ...; if we take ...; if we assume ...; what if ...?
とした事が: (としたことが) - of all people
としちゃ: (としちゃあ) - as (for); for; in the capacity of
としちゃあ: (としちゃあ) - as (for); for; in the capacity of
として: (として) - as (i.e. in the role of)/for (i.e. from the viewpoint of); apart from... (used to change the topic); (before a negative form) even (e.g. "not even a single person"); (after a volitional form) thinking that.../trying to...
としては: (としちゃあ) - as (for); for; in the capacity of
とじ針: (とじばり) - large sewing needle; wool needle
とする: (とする) - (after the volitional form of verb) to try to .../to be about to do ...; (after the dictionary form of verb) to decide to ...; to take as/to treat as; to use for; to suppose that (such) is the case/to assume; to decide that/to think that; to make into/to change into; to feel (e.g. after sound symbolism or psychological experience word)/to look/to feel like; (with を目的) to intend/to have the intention
とすると: (とすると) - if we make ...; if we take ...; if we assume ...
とすれば: (とすれば) - if it happens that; if we make ...; if we take ...; if we assume ...
とちる: (とちる) - to flub (one's lines); to be flustered/to be confused; to bungle/to mess up/to blunder
とち狂う: (とちくるう) - to be playful; to gambol; to be amused (with something); to play; to sport; to frolic; to joke
とち餅: (とちもち) - cake made from pounded horse chestnuts and mochi rice
とっくの昔: (とっくのむかし) - a long time ago
とっくり: (とっくり) - thoroughly; carefully; deliberately; seriously; fully
とっちる: (とっちる) - to be flustered; to be confused
とって代わる: (とってかわる) - to supplant; to supersede
とっとと: (とっとと) - quickly; at once; right away; hurriedly
とっ外れ: (とっぱずれ) - very edge; far border
とて: (とて) - even; even if/even though; because of/on the grounds that
とでもない: (とでもない) - unthinkable; unexpected; outrageous; offensive
とでも言うよう: (とでもいうよう) - (usu. ...とでもいうよう) as if ...; as if to say ...; as though ...
とどの詰まり: (とどのつまり) - in the end; after all is said and done; at the striped mullet's ultimate maturity (when the striped mullet is fully grown)
とどまるところを知らない: (とどまるところをしらない) - knowing no bounds; showing no signs of stopping or slowing down
とどめを刺す: (とどめをさす) - to finish off/to ensure (something) is dead/to deliver the coup de grace; to put an end to/to deliver the final blow; (as ＡはＢに止めを刺す) to be the best for A
となく: (となく) - adds vagueness and indirectness to the word or phrase it is used with
となったら: (となったら) - where ... is concerned; when it becomes; if it becomes
となりの芝生は青い: (となりのしばふはあおい) - (proverb) the grass is always greener on the other side of the fence
となる: (となる) - to become; to amount to
となるために: (となるために) - in order to be(come)...; since it amounts to...; since it is advantageous to...
となると: (となると) - where ... is concerned; when it comes to ...; if it comes to ...; as far as ... is concerned
となれば: (となれば) - where ... is concerned; when it becomes; if it becomes
との事: (とのこと) - I'm told; I'm passing on a message; he was informed; indicates that one has heard the preceding information from somebody
とは: (とは) - indicates word or phrase being defined
とは別に: (とはべつに) - in addition to; apart from
とは言うものの: (とはいうものの) - having said that; be that as it may
とは言え: (とはいえ) - though; although; be that as it may; nonetheless
とは限らない: (とはかぎらない) - not necessarily so; is not always true
とばっちりを食う: (とばっちりをくう) - to be struck by a chance blow; to be embroiled in; to be caught up in; to be dragged into

とび交う: (とびかう) - to fly about; to flutter about; to flit about; to fly past each other
とび出る: (とびでる) - to project/to protrude/to pop out (e.g. eyes); to jump out/to rush out
